channel.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
channel.description:
:p well... i wanted to try and make a weapon again so.... what do you think?
This is a great sword, it is not for stabbing...
Miro's Great Sword: (changes: not seen in view 1 and 3 or the wireframe but i scaled up the blade because it was to short for a greatsword :))
Final Version of the great sword: [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/6981/sexyf.png[/img]
old versions [code]View1 - [img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/2763/sgreatsword.png[/img] View2 - [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/8503/sgreatsword2.png[/img] View3 - [img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/8918/sgreatsword3.png[/img][/code] Wireframe - [img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/7909/wireframe.png[/img]
To be done:
Miro's Spear/glave/halberd?: [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/6067/sglave.png[/img]
[code] http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/2111/sglave2.png [/code] wireframe: [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/1535/adk.png[/img]
Miro's Shield: [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/6206/miroshield.png[/img] [code]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/7582/miroshield2.png[/code] wireframe: [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/6739/shieldofmiro.png[/img]

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:14, topic:430871”][quote author=mironic link=topic=533550.msg3901499#msg3901499 date=1327805604]

You’re better then this

Concepts are all rather basic.

well so is every weapon in skyrim lololol
[/quote]

There are plenty of interesting weapons.

The shield could’ve been buffed out, the color choice was rather bland and the shield overall looked rather hunky.[/quote]look at the wireframe, their toothpicks with textures. lol. this is why i said the re model’d sword i think u did was better then the one in game. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:10, topic:430871”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=533550.msg3901463#msg3901463 date=1327802862]
You’re better then this

Concepts are all rather basic.
[/quote]
well so is every weapon in skyrim lololol[/quote]

There are plenty of interesting weapons.

The shield could’ve been buffed out, the color choice was rather bland and the shield overall looked rather hunky.

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Honestly, you could probably reduce the amount of faces on the blade handle by using a hexagonal shape (more faces on a simple model is not attractive)

As for the shield, you could probably do the same. Instead of all of those semicircles, just use a hex/oct/agon

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

You’ve made alot of mistakes by the looks of it, don’t go out of your way to add a colour (you can always get textures). Next time forcus on getting your wireframe looking better and actually joining. Good job, keep it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Haha. No problem, this is my first visit back to the model section in a year!

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Tribbinator, post:4, topic:430871”]Hey Miro! Just wanted to help a little bit with the blade itself. I have a simple tutorial in my signature which explains how to use a primitive to edge a blade. With the kind of edge on the attached wireframe, you can get a blade to look a lot better! Good luck!

[/quote]
thanks tribby, this is my first blade in a year XD…

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Hey Miro! Just wanted to help a little bit with the blade itself. I have a simple tutorial in my signature which explains how to use a primitive to edge a blade. With the kind of edge on the attached wireframe, you can get a blade to look a lot better! Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:2, topic:430871”]If the great sword is meant to be two-handed, widen the blade a little more. If it’s meant to be one handed, shrink the handle a little more.

Other than that, very nice. The concept is a little basic, but extravagance isn’t really expected from MQO.

Can’t wait to see the rest of the set finished.[/quote]
yeah il widen it a bit more. and shrink the handle
the spear looks pretty awesome on paper… now just to turn it into 3d with prims…

remember when i used to trace?

Read full topic

item.title: Miro's Weaponry (spear and shield added)
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

If the great sword is meant to be two-handed, widen the blade a little more. If it’s meant to be one handed, shrink the handle a little more.

Other than that, very nice. The concept is a little basic, but extravagance isn’t really expected from MQO.

Can’t wait to see the rest of the set finished.

Read full topic
